title: Question:
author: REDice
content: Good day guys and gals. I'm launching my new service the 3 highest vote the priority to launch. for you guys whats the best service to offer? win-win strategy. i want all user benefit on it, if you have an idea to add feel free to comment and suggest. next month on launch:)

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: You will not launch any service with public ideas like this, and there is no link between these services, just as you did not specify your budget, your programming knowledge, your work team, and there are big differences between these services, so you have extra money, so it is better to invest it instead of launching a service within a month and you do not You know a lot about her.In general, playing to earn (token) is the easiest, and crypto exchange is the most difficult, and I do not advise you on the rest of the services.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on August 18, 2023, 12:32:25 PMYou will not launch any service with public ideas like this, and there is no link between these services, just as you did not specify your budget, your programming knowledge, your work team, and there are big differences between these services, so you have extra money, so it is better to invest it instead of launching a service within a month and you do not You know a lot about her.In general, playing to earn (token) is the easiest, and crypto exchange is the most difficult, and I do not advise you on the rest of the services.im planing to launch my website this kind of service but not all coins. i have to create my own token bnb smart chain like this fees or fee token fees to usdt.  in play to earn same token will used in reward

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 18, 2023, 12:58:27 PMim planing to launch my website this kind of service but not all coins. i have to create my own token bnb smart chain like this fees or fee token fees to usdt.  in play to earn same token will used in rewardI don't want to be the bearer of bad news, but I doubt you'll be launching anything next month.  So, let's say "crypto exchange" wins the poll. What's the plan from there? You're just gonna grab a cheap "crypto exchange" script from somewhere like Codecanyon, slap it on your domain, and call it a day?Yes. I'm a bit skeptical, but I hope you've got a solid plan to make this "service" truly work for all users. Looking forward to seeing how it pans out next month!

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 18, 2023, 09:20:21 AMGood day guys and gals. I'm launching my new service the 3 highest vote the priority to launch. for you guys whats the best service to offer? win-win strategy. i want all user benefit on it, if you have an idea to add feel free to comment and suggest. next month on launch:)I remember you as someone who cannot even edit his own casino platform homepage and you are looking to hire someone to fix it for you Quote from: REDice on July 16, 2023, 12:45:44 PM                                                who can help me to create the template of my site. i need to correct some errors of my site with negotiable priceNow you are here again offering to set up any of these when you are not even capable of fixing errors on your site do you know how hard it is to set up an exchange you need to be an expert coder to do this, are you going to hire people to fix this for you, if you only have funding but do not know to code you will have a hard time.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 18, 2023, 09:20:21 AMGood day guys and gals. I'm launching my new service the 3 highest vote the priority to launch. for you guys whats the best service to offer? win-win strategy. i want all user benefit on it, if you have an idea to add feel free to comment and suggest. next month on launch:)Launching of exchange is definitely not a easy task but if you are planning to hire a professional then you also have to spend a lot of time, and money to earn the trust of the crypto community first and what types of Exchange are you actually want to make. But if you wanted to make P2E platform then you need less money plus the chances of getting success in this service are more and i do not like lottery and lending platforms but let's see what is on your mind. Quote from: robelneo on August 18, 2023, 03:05:28 PMNow you are here again offering to set up any of these when you are not even capable of fixing errors on your site do you know how hard it is to set up an exchange you need to be an expert coder to do this, are you going to hire people to fix this for you, if you only have funding but do not know to code you will have a hard time.Someone is getting exposed here. Haha. Nice work, dear, you just nailed it. I mean, I really liked the confidence of Redice here, but I still appreciate it and hope that with time he will learn where to bluff and where not to.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 18, 2023, 09:20:21 AMGood day guys and gals. I'm launching my new service the 3 highest vote the priority to launch. for you guys whats the best service to offer? win-win strategy. i want all user benefit on it, if you have an idea to add feel free to comment and suggest. next month on launch:)I would recommend you to launch your own product and give your best to make it unique and desirable. I won't discourage you at all, but you must have to have a proper plan for the launch of that product because without proper plan and marketing you would be only wasting your time and money. Any product would be good for you, but you must keep in mind that you won't be able to make money from that products anytime soon. I would say that you'll have to do every step of product launching in a professional way to avoid any kind of failures.Launching of your own crypto-exchange isn't going to be a simple task and for something like that a user needs a lot of time. one month is a very short amount of time and something like crypto exchange may not be built properly in that short time duration. I would recommend you to purchase your own domain first if your intention is to launch your own crypto exchange because the first step is always the hardest one and in this case the first step it the purchasing of a good domain name that can be used to present the exchange. An exchange may need some good amount of time, but it's also possible to creating an exchange within a month. However, there won't be a lot of features in a exchange like that.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 18, 2023, 09:20:21 AMGood day guys and gals. I'm launching my new service the 3 highest vote the priority to launch. for you guys whats the best service to offer? win-win strategy. i want all user benefit on it, if you have an idea to add feel free to comment and suggest. next month on launch:)If you need to hear from us what type of service you should start, then it is better not to do anything. Serious dedication is required, and you don't seem to be able to manage three complex and unfamiliar ideas at the same time. Everything you listed above is already seen and the market is crowded with similar successful or less successful businesses. As FatFork says, your desire to start it in the next month only shows that you have not properly understood the complexity of what you are talking about, and that shows your, to put it mildly, unprofessionalism.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: This is very vague question you are trying to ask, and i don't think anyone will give a proper suggestion to it. But let you come up first what you are trying to build specifically then ask if what are the good things to do on that specific thing you're tying to do.

Looking forward to seeing how it pans out next month!i ask my developer  to change it. i prefer spot trading like holding coins convert when the price is cheaper.

However, there won't be a lot of features in a exchange like that.i have already selected domain. i have one product runing in my local area. i want this domain feecoins.com but not available.  then i prefer for roadmap or whitepaper. i built my community in local first before in the international.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 19, 2023, 03:34:24 AMi ask my developer  to change it. i prefer spot trading like holding coins convert when the price is cheaper. What developer? Last time, you couldn't even edit the template on your site or make simple changes, like removing the "Lorem Ipsum" text. (By the way, what happened to that project, anyway?) And now you're saying you can pull off building a whole crypto exchange site? Seriously, you sure you're not getting ahead of yourself? Maybe consider starting small and then working your way up? Just a thought!

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: FatFork on August 19, 2023, 07:39:55 AMQuote from: REDice on August 19, 2023, 03:34:24 AMi ask my developer  to change it. i prefer spot trading like holding coins convert when the price is cheaper. What developer? Last time, you couldn't even edit the template on your site or make simple changes, like removing the "Lorem Ipsum" text. (By the way, what happened to that project, anyway?) And now you're saying you can pull off building a whole crypto exchange site? Seriously, you sure you're not getting ahead of yourself? Maybe consider starting small and then working your way up? Just a thought! i create new project better than previous one because i feel something wrong with the code. and now its its real time. im collecting data.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 19, 2023, 04:07:53 AM then i prefer for roadmap or whitepaper. i built my community in local first before in the international.I'm not sure how it usually goes but I believe writing a whitepaper or roadmap can be done while you work on your website, especially if you work together with other people. It will also help people to consider your idea more seriously since they can see what is your plan in the future, although it doesn't guarantee that you will succeed. Unless you work alone, I don't see the point of delaying of writing or thinking about your roadmap unless you want to just go day by day with your projects.

comments.author: REDice
comments.body: Quote from: joniboini on August 19, 2023, 08:12:48 AMQuote from: REDice on August 19, 2023, 04:07:53 AM then i prefer for roadmap or whitepaper. i built my community in local first before in the international.I'm not sure how it usually goes but I believe writing a whitepaper or roadmap can be done while you work on your website, especially if you work together with other people. It will also help people to consider your idea more seriously since they can see what is your plan in the future, although it doesn't guarantee that you will succeed. Unless you work alone, I don't see the point of delaying of writing or thinking about your roadmap unless you want to just go day by day with your projects. roadmap we need to attach in the landing page. the site still working.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on August 18, 2023, 03:05:28 PM~snip~I remember you as someone who cannot even edit his own casino platform homepage and you are looking to hire someone to fix it for you. It seems that the OP is ready for another waste of time at his expense, because it is more than obvious that he has the desire to do something, but is very far from any serious realization. After all, no serious person would ask for advice on what to do in this way, but would do what he personally believes he can succeed in.I wish I was wrong and that the OP would really do something good and sustainable, but considering his past project, the question arises, who would even dare to use his CEX or invest in his token?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on August 19, 2023, 01:33:16 PMI wish I was wrong and that the OP would really do something good and sustainable, but considering his past project, the question arises, who would even dare to use his CEX or invest in his token?His first platform which is a casino is a big fluke but I like to give him the benefit of the doubt so I'll give him a chance I'm not voting for any of his recommendations I just ask him to set up what he thinks he can handle, your first platform should be good so all succeeding platform you are planning to set up will not be questionable.You know that if the platform is not good you'll receive a lot of negative feedback so better make it good let us know the timeline on what project you are going to launch.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Yeah! Call me a softy, but I am secretly hoping against hope that the OP proves me wrong and actually manages to pull off something legit and sustainable. But, that whole casino fiasco in his past? First impressions count, after all.So, to the OP, here is a piece of advice: Make it good, like really good. It doesn't matter what you do, as long as it is worth the effort. Don't be satisfied with a half-product; those kinds of things never hit the mark. Your audience, your potential users - they can tell when something is slapped together versus when it is been crafted with care. It is not just about throwing stuff out there and hoping it sticks; it is about nailing every detail, making sure it works like a charm, and delivering something that people actually want and need.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on August 18, 2023, 09:20:21 AMGood day guys and gals. I'm launching my new service the 3 highest vote the priority to launch. for you guys whats the best service to offer? win-win strategy. i want all user benefit on it, if you have an idea to add feel free to comment and suggest. next month on launch:)Building a project is not done in this manner except you have specialists in each of these areas and you want to sponsor and be the co-founder of the project. Project development requires more than just public opinion and options, even when you achieve the project, you have to compete with already existing brands in the space you adventured into. Consider this a professional advice. It is not as easy as picking options, it takes more dedication than that.
